reviews.review:
Awesome Movie !!
All full of action , thrill , emotion , drama and humor .
The special effects are fantastic and the story really revolves deeper into the unknown .
Many unexpected moves and unintentional motives take place . 
A #must _watch , you're gonna become the part of history . 
Since it's the biggest spinoff movie ever made .
Can't wait for the second part . 
Best part is an emotion on our nemesis face , at the end ( okay that's just bit a spoiler )

Avengers: Infinity War fits in action, comedy, intensity and an emotional roller coaster in what might be one of the greatest Marvel movie ever made. Thanks to itâ€™s amazing cast performances and well written story, Avengers: Infinity War is one of the best Superhero movie. If not the best movie ever made.

Please ignore that idiotic 86 from the "critics".  THis movie is Empire strikes back good, best of the entire Marvel extended universe, and has a villain that might has displaced heath ledgers Joker as the best ever.  Just go see it.   You'll see.  It's amazing!
The movie is overpopulated but managed not to get crowded. Very very entertaining...

Avengers: Infinity War, certainly lives up to the hype. With 160 minutes of jaw-dropping action and a wide range of remarkable superheroes, what more would you want? However, the most iconic character of the movie is Thanos. Thanos is the main villain of the movie and is willing to do anything to collect all 6 infinity stones. Thanos brings out the hopeless and more emotional side of the Avengers. The characters are still comedic and determined at times, but as it reaches the end of the movie, that changes. Thanos' children (Proxima Midnight, Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian and Corvus Glaive) also play a major role in this movie. They are insistent of helping their father collect the infinity stones. There are so many breath-taking plot twists in this film, especially the one at the end (no spoilers!!). If you haven't already seen Infinity War than I highly suggest you watch it as soon as possible, it is the best, if not one of the best, Marvel Cinematic Universe films ever. However, nothing can prepare you for this spectacular, game-changing movie.

I'm still processing the film but I can say there were great parts but also some really stupid parts. Also, I waited around for the extra scene and it's not worth sitting through the crazy amount of credits for that.
This was so far, the Marvel's best movie. Highly recommend it.
I was on the edge of my seat the whole time. I screamed, I laughed and I cried. Be ready for kickass action
